Title: Voodoo in My Blood
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Talicia Raggs, Christopher Hollier, Carina Adly MacKenzie (executive story editor), K.C. Perry (executive story editor), Kyle Arrington (story editor), Beau DeMayo (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: Old wounds are re-opened when Elijah and Marcel are forced into an uneasy alliance. Together, they meet with Alaric who has tracked down a crucial artifact that could help in their fight against The Hollow.
